{"filters":[{"fieldname":"territory","fieldtype":"Link","label":"Territory","options":"Territory"},{"fieldname":"washing_station","fieldtype":"Link","label":"Washing Station","options":"Washing Station"},{"fieldname":"payment_status","fieldtype":"Select","label":"Payment Status","options":"
Unpaid
Partially Paid
Paid"},{"fieldname":"from_date","fieldtype":"Date","label":"From Date"},{"fieldname":"to_date","fieldtype":"Date","label":"To Date"}],"columns":[{"fieldname":"purchase_name","fieldtype":"Data","label":"Purchase","width":"120"},{"fieldname":"purchase_date","fieldtype":"Date","label":"Date","width":"100"},{"fieldname":"farmer","fieldtype":"Data","label":"Farmer","width":"150"},{"fieldname":"washing_station","fieldtype":"Data","label":"Washing Station","width":"150"},{"fieldname":"grade","fieldtype":"Data","label":"Grade","width":"80"},{"fieldname":"gross_weight","fieldtype":"Float","label":"Weight (kg)","width":"100"},{"fieldname":"total_amount","fieldtype":"Currency","label":"Total Amount","width":"120"},{"fieldname":"paid_amount","fieldtype":"Currency","label":"Paid Amount","width":"120"},{"fieldname":"outstanding_amount","fieldtype":"Currency","label":"Outstanding","width":"120"},{"fieldname":"payment_status","fieldtype":"Data","label":"Status","width":"100"}],"sql":"SELECT 
  p.name as purchase_name,
  p.purchase_date,
  p.farmer,
  p.washing_station,
  p.grade,
  p.gross_weight,
  p.total_amount,
  p.paid_amount,
  p.outstanding_amount,
  p.payment_status
FROM 
  `tabPurchase` p
WHERE 
  p.docstatus = 1
  AND (
    %(territory)s IS NULL 
    OR p.territory = %(territory)s
  )
  AND (
    %(washing_station)s IS NULL 
    OR p.washing_station = %(washing_station)s
  )
  AND (
    %(payment_status)s IS NULL 
    OR p.payment_status = %(payment_status)s
  )
  AND (
    %(from_date)s IS NULL 
    OR DATE(p.purchase_date) >= %(from_date)s
  )
  AND (
    %(to_date)s IS NULL 
    OR DATE(p.purchase_date) <= %(to_date)s
  )
ORDER BY 
  p.purchase_date DESC, p.name DESC"}
name: Payment Status Report
title: Payment Status Report
